User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:5.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0.1
Build ID: 20110707182747

Steps to reproduce:

1) Clicked 'allow' for offline storage for http://www.grantgalitz.org/gamecenter/
2) Went into private browsing mode to the same page.
3) Firefox said I was offline for that page, even though I was not.


Actual results:

Firefox is reporting that the user is offline when one is not, due to html5 offline storage being buggy.


Expected results:

Firefox should not have shown its error page that it was offline.
